messages: Someday, someone may experience{~N}these bizarre events. Hopefully,{~N}they will find my notes useful.{~E}
{~D}I don't have the map{~N}for this place.{~E}
{~D}Too dark to look{~N}at the map here.{~E}
There is a {~C2}First aid kit{~C7}.{~N}Take it?{~S4}
The lock is jammed.{~N}This door can't be opened.{~E}
{~J0(3.4)}My name is Harry Mason.{~N}I'm in town on vacation.{~E}
{~J1(3.6)}I'm Dr. Michael Kaufmann.{~N}I work at this hospital.{~E}
{~J1(2.5)}So maybe you can tell me{~N}what's going on?
{~J1(4.5)}I was taking a nap{~N}in the staff room.{~N}When I woke up, it was like this.
{~J1(3.0)}And it's snowing out.{~N}This time of year.
{~J1(3.5)}You and I both know,{~N}creatures like that don't exist!
{~J1(4.0)}But with all those{~N}monsters around,{~N}I highly doubt that she's...
{~J0(5.0)}She died four years ago.{~N}Now, it's just me and my daughter.
{~J0(2.7)}I can't just sit{~N}around here doing nothing.
These are phones and phonebooks.{~N}No need to examine this.{~E}
